vendors.name: Vintage Treasures
vendors.description: Specializing in authentic mid-century modern pieces from the 1950s-1970s, including furniture, lighting, and decorative objects.

vendors.name: Southern Heritage
vendors.description: Offering authentic Americana, folk art, primitives, and handcrafted items with a focus on Southern heritage and traditions.

vendors.name: Time Capsule Collectibles
vendors.description: Nostalgic collection of vintage toys, advertising signs, and memorabilia from the 1920s through the 1980s.

vendors.name: Heritage Silver
vendors.description: Curated collection of sterling silver, silverplate, and fine estate jewelry from various periods.
